posts.post_content: [Terror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terror) that can kill everything except black creatures? Insane. The "no regenerate" might be gone but who's complaining when you have a spell that can take out most creatures in the game? That, and regenerate is a scarce ability anyway.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Nice card, HATE the name. Sounds very juvenile. "I'm gonna kill you with my DOOM BLADE!" Yeah, it sounds extremely cheesy.  
  
Note: Zevilmustache, the reason removal is so good is because 2010 goes on the \*\*\*umption that they need to overpower something to suck in the older players who would hate the rule changes, such as the re-addition of [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt). It's kinda like that expression you hear from time to time, "Come to the dark side, we have cookies."
